sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content: This is a comprehensive reference list of common Japanese counters organized by category. Use this as a quick lookup guide when you need to count something in Japanese.

sections.heading: General Objects
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------- | ----------- | ------------------------- | ----------- | | つ | tsu | General items (1-10) | りんご 3 つ | | 個 (こ) | ko | Small, compact objects | ボール 5 個 | | 本 (ほん) | hon/bon/pon | Long, cylindrical objects | ペン 3 本 | | 枚 (まい) | mai | Flat, thin objects | 紙 10 枚 | | 台 (だい) | dai | Machines, vehicles | 車 2 台 | | 冊 (さつ) | satsu | Books, magazines | 本 5 冊 | | 点 (てん) | ten | Items, artworks | 作品 3 点 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: りんごを3つ買いました "I bought 3 apples" ボールが5個あります "There are 5 balls" ペンを3本持っています "I have 3 pens" 紙を10枚ください "10 sheets of paper, please" 車を2台持っています "I have 2 cars" 本を5冊読みました "I read 5 books"

sections.heading: People & Living Things
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------- | -------------- | --------------- | ------------ | | 人 (にん) | nin/ri | People | 学生 3 人 | | 名 (めい) | mei | People (polite) | 参加者 50 名 | | 匹 (ひき) | hiki/biki/piki | Small animals | 犬 2 匹 | | 頭 (とう) | tou | Large animals | 象 3 頭 | | 羽 (わ) | wa | Birds, rabbits | 鳥 5 羽 | | 尾 (び) | bi | Fish (formal) | 鯛 2 尾 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 友達が3人来ました "3 friends came" 参加者は50名です "There are 50 participants" 犬を2匹飼っています "I have 2 dogs" 象が3頭います "There are 3 elephants" 鳥が5羽飛んでいます "5 birds are flying"

sections.heading: Clothing & Accessories
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------- | ------------- | | 着 (ちゃく) | chaku | Suits, complete outfits | スーツ 2 着 | | 枚 (まい) | mai | Shirts, pants, skirts | T シャツ 3 枚 | | 足 (そく) | soku | Pairs of footwear | 靴 2 足 | | 本 (ほん) | hon/bon/pon | Ties, belts | ネクタイ 5 本 | | 個 (こ) | ko | Accessories | ボタン 10 個 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: スーツを2着持っています "I have 2 suits" Tシャツを3枚買いました "I bought 3 T-shirts" 靴を2足買いました "I bought 2 pairs of shoes" ネクタイを5本持っています "I have 5 ties"

sections.heading: Food & Drink
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | ----------- | ----------- | -------------------- | ------------- | | 杯 (はい) | hai/bai/pai | Cups, glasses, bowls | コーヒー 2 杯 | | 皿 (さら) | sara | Plates of food | 料理 3 皿 | | 切れ (きれ) | kire | Slices | パン 2 切れ | | 粒 (つぶ) | tsubu | Grains, pills | 米粒 100 粒 | | 本 (ほん) | hon/bon/pon | Bottles, long food | ビール 3 本 | | 個 (こ) | ko | Pieces, items | おにぎり 2 個 | | 缶 (かん) | kan | Cans | ジュース 5 缶 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: コーヒーを2杯飲みました "I drank 2 cups of coffee" 料理を3皿注文しました "I ordered 3 dishes" パンを2切れ食べました "I ate 2 slices of bread" ビールを3本買いました "I bought 3 bottles of beer"

sections.heading: Buildings & Places
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------- | ------- | ------------------- | -------------- | | 階 (かい) | kai | Floors of buildings | 3 階 | | 軒 (けん) | ken | Houses, shops | 家 5 軒 | | 棟 (とう) | tou | Buildings | ビル 2 棟 | | 室 (しつ) | shitsu | Rooms | 会議室 3 室 | | 店 (てん) | ten | Stores, shops | コンビニ 10 店 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 3階に住んでいます "I live on the 3rd floor" この通りに家が5軒あります "There are 5 houses on this street" ビルが2棟建っています "2 buildings are standing" 会議室が3室あります "There are 3 meeting rooms"

sections.heading: Time & Frequency
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | ----------------- | ------- | ------------------ | ------- | | 回 (かい) | kai | Times, occurrences | 3 回 | | 度 (ど) | do | Times, degrees | 2 度 | | 時間 (じかん) | jikan | Hours (duration) | 3 時間 | | 分 (ふん) | fun/pun | Minutes | 5 分 | | 秒 (びょう) | byou | Seconds | 10 秒 | | 日 (にち) | nichi | Days | 3 日間 | | 週間 (しゅうかん) | shuukan | Weeks | 2 週間 | | ヶ月 (かげつ) | kagetsu | Months | 3 ヶ月 | | 年 (ねん) | nen | Years | 5 年 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 日本に3回行きました "I went to Japan 3 times" 2時間待ちました "I waited 2 hours" 5分ください "Give me 5 minutes" 2週間の旅行 "A 2-week trip" 3ヶ月勉強しました "I studied for 3 months"

sections.heading: Paper & Documents
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------- | ------- | ------------------ | ------------ | | 枚 (まい) | mai | Sheets, pages | コピー 10 枚 | | 通 (つう) | tsuu | Letters, documents | 手紙 2 通 | | 部 (ぶ) | bu | Copies, sets | 資料 5 部 | | ページ | peeji | Pages | 20 ページ | | 冊 (さつ) | satsu | Bound books | 雑誌 3 冊 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: コピーを10枚してください "Please make 10 copies" 手紙を2通書きました "I wrote 2 letters" 資料を5部印刷しました "I printed 5 copies of the materials" 20ページ読みました "I read 20 pages"

sections.heading: Abstract Concepts
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------------- | ------- | -------------- | ----------- | | つ | tsu | Ideas, reasons | 理由 3 つ | | 件 (けん) | ken | Cases, matters | 事件 2 件 | | 項目 (こうもく) | koumoku | Items, topics | 項目 5 項目 | | 問 (もん) | mon | Questions | 質問 10 問 | | 語 (ご) | go | Words | 単語 100 語 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 理由が3つあります "There are 3 reasons" 事件が2件ありました "There were 2 incidents" 質問が10問あります "There are 10 questions" 単語を100語覚えました "I memorized 100 words"

sections.heading: Money & Numbers
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------------- | ------- | -------------- | -------- | | 円 (えん) | en | Yen | 1000 円 | | ドル | doru | Dollars | 50 ドル | | 番 (ばん) | ban | Numbers, order | 3 番 | | 号 (ごう) | gou | Number, issue | 5 号室 | | 番号 (ばんごう) | bangou | Number | 電話番号 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 1000円です "It's 1000 yen" 50ドル払いました "I paid 50 dollars" 3番に並んでください "Please line up at number 3" 5号室です "It's room 5"

sections.heading: Transportation
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | ----------- | ------- | -------------- | ------------- | | 台 (だい) | dai | Vehicles | 車 3 台 | | 機 (き) | ki | Aircraft | 飛行機 2 機 | | 隻 (せき) | seki | Ships | 船 5 隻 | | 両 (りょう) | ryou | Train cars | 電車 8 両 | | 便 (びん) | bin | Flights, trips | フライト 2 便 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 車が3台あります "There are 3 cars" 飛行機が2機飛んでいます "2 airplanes are flying" 電車は8両編成です "The train has 8 cars"

sections.heading: Nature
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------- | ----------- | ------------------ | ----------- | | 本 (ほん) | hon/bon/pon | Trees | 木 10 本 | | 株 (かぶ) | kabu | Plants, stocks | 花 5 株 | | 輪 (りん) | rin | Flowers (on stems) | バラ 3 輪 | | 粒 (つぶ) | tsubu | Drops, grains | 雨粒 100 粒 | | 滴 (てき) | teki | Drops (liquid) | 水 3 滴 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 庭に木が10本あります "There are 10 trees in the garden" 花を5株植えました "I planted 5 flower plants" バラが3輪咲いています "3 roses are blooming"

children.heading: Common Patterns
children.content:
ほん/ぼん/ぽん (本, Long objects)

1本 = いっぽん 3本 = さんぼん 6本 = ろっぽん

ひき/びき/ぴき (匹, Small animals)

1匹 = いっぴき 3匹 = さんびき 6匹 = ろっぴき

はい/ばい/ぱい (杯, Cups)

1杯 = いっぱい 3杯 = さんばい 6杯 = ろっぱい

children.heading: Numbers That Trigger Changes
children.content: 1 (いち) → often becomes いっ 3 (さん) → triggers ん sound → b/p 6 (ろく) → often becomes ろっ 8 (はち) → often becomes はっ 10 (じゅう) → often becomes じゅっ

children.heading: "I don't know which counter to use!"
children.content:
For objects:

Is it long/cylindrical? → 本 Is it flat/thin? → 枚 Is it small/compact? → 個 Not sure? → つ (1-10 only)

For living things:

Person? → 人 Small animal? → 匹 Large animal? → 頭 Bird? → 羽 or 匹

For drinks/food:

In a cup/glass? → 杯 On a plate? → 皿 Bottle? → 本 Slice? → 切れ

sections.heading: Practice Exercise
sections.content:
Try counting these items:

3 apples = りんごを3個/3つ 5 pens = ペンを5本 2 cats = 猫を2匹 10 sheets of paper = 紙を10枚 4 people = 4人 2 cups of coffee = コーヒーを2杯 7th floor = 7階 3 times = 3回 2 books = 本を2冊 5 cars = 車を5台

children.heading: Specialized Counters
children.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------------- | ------- | -------------------- | ------------- | | 巻 (かん) | kan | Volumes, rolls | 巻物 3 巻 | | 品 (ひん) | hin | Products, items | 商品 5 品 | | 局 (きょく) | kyoku | Pieces of music | 曲 3 局 | | 曲 (きょく) | kyoku | Songs | 歌 5 曲 | | 組 (くみ) | kumi | Sets, pairs | セット 3 組 | | 束 (たば) | taba | Bundles | 花束 2 束 | | 箱 (はこ) | hako | Boxes | 箱 3 箱 | | 袋 (ふくろ) | fukuro | Bags | 袋 2 袋 | | 膳 (ぜん) | zen | Meals, sets | 定食 2 膳 | | 人前 (にんまえ) | ninmae | Servings/portions | 3 人前 | | 丁 (ちょう) | chou | Blocks, tools | 豆腐 1 丁 | | 玉 (たま) | tama | Balls, round objects | キャベツ 3 玉 | | 房 (ふさ) | fusa | Bunches (fruit) | バナナ 2 房 | | 株 (かぶ) | kabu | Plants, companies | 野菜 5 株 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 漫画を3巻買いました "I bought 3 volumes of manga" この曲を5曲知っています "I know 5 of these songs" 靴下を3組買いました "I bought 3 pairs of socks" 花束を2束もらいました "I received 2 bouquets" チョコレートの箱が3箱あります "There are 3 boxes of chocolate" 定食を2膳お願いします "2 set meals, please"

sections.heading: Sports & Games
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | ------------------- | -------- | --------------- | ---------- | | 勝 (しょう) | shou | Wins | 3 勝 | | 敗 (はい) | hai | Losses | 2 敗 | | 引き分け (ひきわけ) | hikiwake | Draws | 1 引き分け | | ゲーム | geemu | Games | 3 ゲーム | | セット | setto | Sets | 2 セット | | ラウンド | raundo | Rounds | 5 ラウンド | | 打 (だ) | da | Hits (baseball) | 3 打 | | 点 (てん) | ten | Points | 10 点 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 3勝2敗です "3 wins, 2 losses" 3ゲームで勝ちました "Won in 3 games" 10点取りました "Scored 10 points"

sections.heading: Academic & Work
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | ------------- | ------- | ------------------- | ------------ | | 問 (もん) | mon | Questions, problems | 問題 10 問 | | 課 (か) | ka | Lessons | 第 3 課 | | 章 (しょう) | shou | Chapters | 5 章 | | 単位 (たんい) | tan'i | Credits | 単位 20 単位 | | 科目 (かもく) | kamoku | Subjects | 科目 5 科目 | | 期 (き) | ki | Terms, periods | 第 2 期 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 問題を10問解きました "I solved 10 problems" 5章まで読みました "I read up to chapter 5" 20単位取りました "I earned 20 credits"

sections.heading: Technology
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------- | ----------- | ---------------- | ------------- | | 台 (だい) | dai | Devices | パソコン 2 台 | | 個 (こ) | ko | Apps, files | アプリ 5 個 | | 件 (けん) | ken | Messages, emails | メール 10 件 | | 枚 (まい) | mai | Photos (digital) | 写真 50 枚 | | 本 (ほん) | hon/bon/pon | Videos | 動画 3 本 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: パソコンを2台持っています "I have 2 computers" アプリを5個ダウンロードしました "I downloaded 5 apps" メールが10件来ています "There are 10 emails" 写真を50枚撮りました "I took 50 photos" 動画を3本見ました "I watched 3 videos"

sections.heading: Medical & Body
sections.content: | Counter | Reading | Used For | Example | | --------------- | ----------- | ---------------- | ------------- | | 錠 (じょう) | jou | Pills, tablets | 薬 2 錠 | | 粒 (つぶ) | tsubu | Pills (small) | カプセル 3 粒 | | 本 (ほん) | hon/bon/pon | Injections | 注射 2 本 | | 滴 (てき) | teki | Drops (medicine) | 目薬 3 滴 | | 人分 (にんぶん) | ninbun | Doses | 薬 3 人分 |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: この薬を1日2錠飲んでください "Please take 2 tablets of this medicine per day" 注射を2本打ちました "I got 2 injections" 目薬を3滴さしてください "Please put in 3 drops of eye drops"

children.heading: In casual conversation, counters can sometimes be omitted:
children.content: Full: りんごを3個買いました Casual: りんご3つ買った "I bought 3 apples" Full: 友達が5人来ます Casual: 友達5人来る "5 friends are coming"

children.heading: But generally, use counters for clarity!
Combining different counters in one sentence:
children.content: 3人で2時間、5回練習しました "3 people practiced 5 times for 2 hours" 2階の会議室で3回会議があります "There are 3 meetings in the meeting room on the 2nd floor" 友達3人と映画を2本見ました "I watched 2 movies with 3 friends"

children.heading: Some items need both:
children.content: ペットボトル3本 "3 plastic bottles" (ペットボトル = type, 本 = counter) 千円札5枚 "5 one-thousand yen bills" (千円札 = type, 枚 = counter) 缶ビール2本 "2 cans of beer" (缶 = can, 本 = counter for bottles)

children.heading: Some counters vary by region:
children.content: Standard: 2人 (ふたり) Kansai: sometimes still 2人 (ににん) Standard: 一個 (いっこ) Some regions: 一つ (ひとつ) preferred

children.heading: Priority Order for Learners:
children.content:
Essential (Learn First):

つ - general counter 人 - people 個 - small objects 枚 - flat objects 本 - long objects

Important (Learn Next): 6. 匹 - small animals 7. 台 - machines 8. 杯 - cups 9. 回 - times 10. 階 - floors

Useful (Learn Gradually):

冊 (books) 頭 (large animals) 着 (clothing) 足 (footwear) 軒 (buildings)

Advanced (Learn as needed):

Specialized counters for your field Literary or formal counters Technical counters

children.heading: Top 5 Mistakes:
children.content: Forgetting counters entirely Wrong: 3買いました ❌ Right: 3個買いました ✓ Wrong sound changes Wrong: さんほん ❌ Right: さんぼん ✓ Using wrong counter Wrong: 紙3本 ❌ Right: 紙3枚 ✓ Mixing people counters Wrong: いちにん ❌ Right: ひとり ✓ Using counters for wrong items Wrong: 犬3頭 ❌ Right: 犬3匹 ✓

children.heading: Visual Association:
children.content: 本 looks like a tree trunk → long objects 枚 has 木 (tree) → flat like a board 人 looks like a person → people 匹 has 匚 (box) → small animals fit in boxes

children.heading: Sound Pattern Memory:
children.content:
Remember the trio:

本 (hon/bon/pon) 匹 (hiki/biki/piki) 杯 (hai/bai/pai)

All follow the same pattern!

children.heading: Context Clues:
children.content:
Ask yourself:

What shape is it? Is it living or not? How is it typically used?

children.heading: When in doubt:
children.content: Use つ for objects (1-10) Use 個 for objects (11+) Ask a native speaker!

children.heading: Don't worry about perfection:
children.content: Native speakers will understand context Some counters are interchangeable It's okay to ask "what counter should I use?"

children.heading: Keep practicing:
children.content: Notice counters in real Japanese Practice with everyday items Learn as you go!

examples.sentence: Forgetting counters entirely Wrong: 3買いました ❌ Right: 3個買いました ✓
Wrong sound changes Wrong: さんほん ❌ Right: さんぼん ✓
Using wrong counter Wrong: 紙3本 ❌ Right: 紙3枚 ✓
Mixing people counters Wrong: いちにん ❌ Right: ひとり ✓
Using counters for wrong items Wrong: 犬3頭 ❌ Right: 犬3匹 ✓
10 (じゅう) → often becomes じゅっ
本 looks like a tree trunk → long objects
枚 has 木 (tree) → flat like a board
人 looks like a person → people
匹 has 匚 (box) → small animals fit in boxes
It's okay to ask "what counter should I use?"
